# Hands-On Lab: Foundation Models

## Goal {.unnumbered}
In this hands-on lab, participants will dive into the practical application of foundation models, such as GPT, for Arctic research. The session is designed to guide participants through customizing and applying these advanced AI tools to analyze and interpret data specific to Arctic science challenges. By the lab's conclusion, participants will have developed the skills to use foundation models creatively and effectively.

## Key Elements {.unnumbered}
Customizing foundation models for Arctic research, addressing real-world Arctic research scenarios
